title: National strategic artificial intelligence plans: A multi-dimensional analysis
analysis_techniques: Content analysis; Qualitative analysis; Document analysis
research_topics: Implementation and governance; Determinants, risks and impacts
research_description: This paper provides a multi-dimensional analysis of national strategic AI plans. It reviews 34 national AI strategies and assesses how countries plan to leverage AI in public and private sectors.
research_results: The analysis reveals key findings in governance, public sector innovation, and capacity development for AI. It highlights opportunities and challenges in implementing AI strategies.
future_research: Further research is suggested to investigate the long-term impacts of AI implementation on public policy and governance across different contexts.
